name: X-Saber Gottoms
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ EARTH monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Saber" or "Gottoms" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can discard 1 random card from their hand. When your "X-Saber" monster is targeted for an attack while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, then change the attack target to it. You can only use each effect of "X-Saber Gottoms" once per turn.
